alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern St. Lawrence County through 200 PM EDT... At 103 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gouverneur, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gouverneur, De Kalb, Fowler, Colton, Degrasse, Richville, Hermon, Pierrepont, Russell, Rossie, Edwards, Pyrites, Talcville, South Edwards, Nelson Corner, North Russell, Fullerville, De Kalb Junction, North Gouverneur, and Balmat. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southwestern St. Lawrence
